MarviNotes

  • the package should check for existence of marvin (or folk?) as a (non-admin, non-sudo user) and create if not available
  • the daemon should
    • wait for swipesecure events and do overlayfs as appropriate http://askubuntu.com/questions/109413/how-do-i-use-overlayfs
    • run mopidy as the folk user
    • do sync between users (folk is also a user, the default) either "on demand" or "always" (the latter collapsing to the former when disk is low)

File systems:

~/Music: symlink or overlayfs merging all signed-in profiles

/home/folk -- autologin
~/data/Moll/Music
....../Nell
....../Sue
